direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the state of the map by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while removeMapping removes specific elements.
Both methods involve state changes in the map, though put adds elements while clear removes them.
Both methods involve modifying the map's state, though putAll adds multiple elements while clear removes all.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the map before clearing it can help ensure a consistent state for testing.
Adding elements to the map before clearing it can help verify that the clear method works correctly.
After clearing the map, verifying that it is empty can help ensure the clear method worked as expected.
